name: ARGeometrySource
desc: Mesh data in a buffer-based array.

items.name: subscript(Int32) -> (Float, Float, Float)
items.desc: Provides the source float triplet at the subscripted index.

items.name: subscript(Int32) -> CUnsignedChar
items.desc: Provides the number at the subscripted index.

items.name: var buffer: MTLBuffer
items.desc: A Metal buffer that contains a list of vectors.

items.name: var componentsPerVector: Int
items.desc: The number of scalar components in each vector.

items.name: var count: Int
items.desc: The number of vectors in the buffer.

items.name: var format: MTLVertexFormat
items.desc: The type of vector data in the buffer.

items.name: var offset: Int
items.desc: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the buffer.

items.name: var stride: Int
items.desc: The length, in bytes, of the start of one vector in the buffer to the start of the next vector.
